graphql.query:
mutation CreatePost {
    createPost(
        input: {
            title: "meowwwww"
            media: ["{{new_profile_pic}}", "{{base64_photo1}}","{{base64_photo2}}"]
            mediadescription: "{{invalid_email}}"
            contenttype: image
        }
        action: POST  
    ) {
        meta {
            status
            RequestId
            ResponseCode
            ResponseMessage
        }
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
        }
         
    }
}

graphql.query:
mutation CreatePost {
    createPost(action: POST, input: { title: "text's", mediadescription: "text's", contenttype: text, media: ["{{new_bio}}"], cover: "{{base64_photo1}}" }) {
        meta {
            status
            RequestId
            ResponseCode
            ResponseMessage
        }
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
            user {
                id
                username
                slug
                img
                isfollowed
                isfollowing
            }
            comments {
                commentid
                userid
                postid
                parentid
                content
                createdat
                amountlikes
                amountreplies
                isliked
                visibilityStatus
          isHiddenForUsers
                hasActiveReports
                isreported
                user {
                    id
                    username
                    slug
                    img
                    isfollowed
                    isfollowing
                isreported
                visibilityStatus
          isHiddenForUsers
                hasActiveReports
}
            }
        }
    }
}

            comments {

                userid
                postid
                parentid
                content
                createdat
                amountlikes
                amountreplies
                isliked
                visibilityStatus
          isHiddenForUsers
                hasActiveReports

}

exec: pm.test("Check advertisement posts order and type", function () {

graphql.query:
query ListAdvertisementPosts {
    listAdvertisementPosts {
        counter
        meta {
            status
            RequestId
            ResponseCode
            ResponseMessage
        }
        affectedRows {
            post {
                id
                contenttype
                title
                media
                cover
                mediadescription
                createdat
                amountlikes
                amountviews
                amountcomments
                amountdislikes
                amounttrending
                isliked
                isviewed
                isreported
                isdisliked
                issaved
                tags
                url
                user {
                    id
                    username
                    slug
                    img
                    isfollowed
                    isfollowing
                isreported
                visibilityStatus
          isHiddenForUsers
                hasActiveReports
    isfriend
                }
            }
            advertisement {
                advertisementid
                postid
                advertisementtype
                startdate
                enddate
                createdat
                user {
                    id
                    username
                    slug
                    img
                    isfollowed
                    isfollowing
                isreported
                visibilityStatus
          isHiddenForUsers
                hasActiveReports
    isfriend
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

exec: pm.test("Latest operation (total 50): CREDIT + PEER_FEE + BURN_FEE are present and sum up correctly", function () {
pm.expect(latestOpTxs.length, "No transactions found for latest operationid").to.be.above(0);
pm.expect(creditTxs.length,  "CREDIT transaction missing for latest operation").to.be.above(0);
const creditTotal  = creditTxs.reduce((sum, t) => sum + Number(t.tokenamount), 0);
const peerFeeTotal = peerFeeTxs.reduce((sum, t) => sum + Number(t.tokenamount), 0);
const burnFeeTotal = burnFeeTxs.reduce((sum, t) => sum + Number(t.tokenamount), 0);

graphql.query:
query GetTransactionHistory {
    getTransactionHistory {
        status
        ResponseCode
        affectedRows {
            transactionid
            operationid
            transactiontype
            senderid
            recipientid
            tokenamount
            transferaction
            message
            createdat
            sender {
                userid
                img
                username
                slug
                biography
                visibilityStatus
          isHiddenForUsers
                hasActiveReports
                updatedat
            }
            recipient {
                userid
                img
                username
                slug
                biography
                visibilityStatus
          isHiddenForUsers
                hasActiveReports
                updatedat
            }
        }
    }
}

                    amountviews
                    amountcomments
                    amountdislikes
                    amounttrending
                    isliked
                    isviewed
                    isreported
                    isdisliked
                    issaved
                    url
                    tags
                    user {
                        id
                        username
                        slug
                        img
                        isfollowed
                        isfollowing
                        isfriend
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
